{"id":1040542134,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1693850098,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"40 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1040542134/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Insert Greatest Common Divisors in Linked List","memory":"30.2 MB","code":"/**\n * Definition for singly-linked list.\n * struct ListNode {\n *     int val;\n *     ListNode *next;\n *     ListNode() : val(0), next(nullptr) {}\n *     ListNode(int x) : val(x), next(nullptr) {}\n *     ListNode(int x, ListNode *next) : val(x), next(next) {}\n * };\n */\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    ListNode* insertGreatestCommonDivisors(ListNode* head) {\n        ListNode* curr = head->next;\n        ListNode* prev = head;\n\n        while(curr != NULL){\n            int gcd = __gcd(prev->val, curr->val);\n            ListNode* temp = new ListNode(gcd);\n            prev->next = temp;\n            temp ->next = curr;\n            prev = curr;\n            curr = curr->next;\n        }\n\n        return head;\n        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"insert-greatest-common-divisors-in-linked-list","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
